text: The President of Malta () is the head of state of Malta. The President is appointed by a resolution of the House of Representatives of Malta for a five- year term, taking an oath to "preserve, protect and defend" the Constitution.Article 50 and the Second Schedule of the Constitution of Malta The President of Malta also resides directly or indirectly in all three branches of the state. They are part of Parliament and responsible for the appointment of the judiciary. They also help appoint the Prime Minister.Articles 51, 96 and 78 of the Constitution of Malta ==List of presidents== ;Status No. President Portrait Tenure Tenure Elected Political affiliation (at time of appointment) Political affiliation (at time of appointment) Prime Minister No. President Portrait Took office Left office Elected Political affiliation (at time of appointment) Political affiliation (at time of appointment) Prime Minister 1 Sir Anthony Mamo 1974 1976 – Independent Dom Mintoff 2 Anton Buttigieg 1976 1981 – Labour Party Mintoff – Albert Hyzler 1981 1982 – Labour Party Mintoff 3 Agatha Barbara 1982 1987 – Labour Party Mintoff Mifsud Bonnici – Paul Xuereb 1987 1989 – Labour Party Mifsud Bonnici Fenech Adami 4 Ċensu Tabone 1989 1994 – Nationalist Party Fenech Adami 5 Ugo Mifsud Bonnici 1994 1999 – Nationalist Party Fenech Adami Sant Fenech Adami 6 Guido de Marco 1999 2004 – Nationalist Party Fenech Adami Gonzi 7 Eddie Fenech Adami 2004 2009 – Nationalist Party Gonzi 8 George Abela 2009 2014 2009 Labour Party Gonzi Muscat 9 Marie-Louise Coleiro Preca 2014 2019 2014 Labour Party Muscat 10 George Vella 4 April 2019 4 April 2024 2019 Labour Party Muscat, Abela 11 Myriam Spiteri Debono 4 April 2024 Incumbent 2024 Labour Party Abela ==Living former heads of state== there were four living former Maltese Heads of State: Image Name Term/Reign Office Date of birth Ugo Mifsud Bonnici 1994–1999 President of Malta Eddie Fenech Adami 2004–2009 President of Malta George Abela 2009–2014 President of Malta Marie-Louise Coleiro Preca 2014–2019 President of Malta George Vella 2019–2024 President of Malta ==References== *
title: President of Malta
